category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSESearchShownColumnWidthsPref
preference.preference_description: Determines column width for each column defined in the PSESearchColumnsShownPref preference. Valid Values: One or more integers as values; each integer determines the column width in characters. The first value listed in this preference determines the column width of the first column defined in the preference, PSESearchColumnsShownPref and so on.
